page.title: 01Gazetteer.
page.content: This block (05520381)was done in conjunction with block 05480381 as the dividing line between them ran down the middle of Station Rd.Sutton is situated on England's east coast, 3 miles south of{Mablethorpe}and 15 miles north of{Skegness. Trusthorpe is about 1 mile north of Sutton and {Sandilands}is about 1 mile south. Sutton is a villageto which a lot of people retire.It is also a holiday resort.It gets very busy around June. We have a permanent population of about 1900 but there are lots of houses which are mainly holiday homes.We have one main street of shops.There are some houses that were especially built for old people.We have a nice beach which is covered in sand but sometimes gets stones and pebbles washed up.Sutton is a nice place to live.
